DOC.brief_summary: The aim study prevent asthma allergy childhood supplementation fish oil ( n-3 fatty acid ) mother pregnancy . Paticipants mother child participate ABC- ( Asthma Begins Childhood ) cohort . Mothers recruit pregnancy receive supplement n-3 fatty acid olive oil ( placebo ) week 24 gestation 1 week delivery . The child follow acute planned visit research unit diagnosis disease do research unit accord predefined algorithm .
DOC.brief_title: Fish Oil Supplementation During Pregnancy Prevention Asthma , Eczema Allergies Childhood
DOC.criteria: Inclusion Criteria ( mother ) : Pregnant woman Living Sealand , Denmark Fluent Danish Language Willing let newborn child participate study Exclusion Criteria ( mother ) : Participating clinical trial
